alert.note: Alert for Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 7:13AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Trap Rock River near Lake Linden affecting Houghton County. .Melting snowpack will increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Trap Rock River near Lake Linden. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water reaches the bottom of the bridge on Cemetery Road creating backwater effects at and upstream of the gauging station * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 4 PM EDT.
